title: IndoStar Capital Finance Q3 profit plunges 40 pc - The Financial Express
content: IndoStar Capital Finance Q3 profit plunges 40 pc  The Financial Express
description: Total revenue from operations was up by 4 per cent to Rs 163.8 crore in the October-December quarter of FY22 against Rs 156.8 crore in Q3FY21, IndoStar Capital said in a release.
